title: One Piece Little Garden Arc (70-77) Review
author: DL Studios
description: A detailed review of the Little Garden Arc episodes 70-77, praising it as some of the best writing in the series with great character moments and jokes.

author: Safa
description: Podcast discussion covering the conclusion of the Little Garden Arc, with analysis of the giants' story and the crew's departure.

title: One Piece: Little Garden Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: A comprehensive recap and review describing the Little Garden Arc as a captivating adventure filled with charismatic characters, comedic moments, and thrilling action.

description: Analysis showing that the Little Garden arc had the lowest average ranking of a decent-sized One Piece arc in Weekly Shonen Jump, providing historical context for the arc's reception.
